articles.title: Pep Guardiola has finally lost trust in Man City player after poor form [Opinion] - Vital Manchester City
articles.description: Riyad Mahrez was an unused substitute in Manchester City’s 2-1 win over Fulham despite scoring in Wednesday’s 3-1 win over Sevilla.
